excerpt: Jungle wildlife refuge featuring guided tours & views of monkeys, toucans, ocelots & other animals.
detail_description: Güirá Oga is a wildlife sanctuary and rehabilitation center located just outside Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. The 19-hectare refuge is dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating native fauna such as monkeys, toucans, ocelots, and other animals. Visitors can support conservation efforts by taking guided tours to learn about the significance of wildlife protection and rehabilitation.
name: Güirá Oga
address: RN12 1638, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Park with an ecological theme featuring a jumbo model trap built with endangered trees, plus a cafe.
detail_description: La Aripuca is a unique ecological theme park located in Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. It serves as an educational attraction that raises awareness about deforestation. The park features a large model trap constructed from endangered trees and offers guided tours with informative facts about the impact of deforestation. Visitors can explore a house made from massive tree trunks and learn about the culture and history of the indigenous people through exhibitions and crafts.
name: La Aripuca
address: 9CJR+HJ, RN12 2, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Puerto Iguazú is a city in northeast Argentina. It’s a gateway to Iguazú Falls in Iguazú National Park, with hundreds of cascades. The towering Garganta del Diablo fall sits in lush, wildlife-rich rainforest. Northwest, the Three Borders Landmark overlooks the rivers where Brazil, Paraguay and Argentina meet. Tancredo Neves Bridge crosses the River Iguazú to Brazil. Iguazú Biocenter has a butterfly farm and orchids.
detail_description: Puerto Iguazú, located in northeast Argentina, serves as the gateway to the breathtaking Iguazú Falls within the Iguazú National Park. The area is abundant with lush rainforests and diverse wildlife, including the impressive Garganta del Diablo waterfall. Additionally, visitors can explore the Three Borders Landmark offering stunning views of where Brazil, Paraguay, and Argentina meet.
name: Puerto Iguazú
address: Misiones Province, Argentina

detail_description: The Feirinha Puerto Iguazú is a must-visit spot in Argentina, drawing both tourists and locals. This simple market offers a range of typical Argentine products like alfajores, sweets, and cheese. It's a lively place where you can enjoy a casual dining experience with friends or family, savoring empanadas and snacks while having some beer.
name: Feirinha Puerto Iguazú
address: Av. Brasil 530, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: River views feature at this landmark park, fountain & obelisk dividing Argentina, Brazil & Paraguay.
detail_description: Hito Tres Fronteras, also known as the Three Borders Landmark, is a significant park located at the meeting point of Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay. This landmark features an obelisk painted in the colors of the Paraguayan flag and offers stunning views of the Iguazu and Parana rivers. Recently renovated, it now includes a lookout point and green spaces for visitors to admire the beauty of the trinational region.
name: Hito Tres Fronteras (Argentina)
address: Av. Río Iguazú, Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Charming garden where visitors can observe hummingbirds sipping nectar from colorful bird feeders.
detail_description: Jardin de los Picaflores is a charming garden located in Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. It started as a family project in the backyard of their home and has become a popular spot for visitors to observe numerous hummingbirds sipping nectar from colorful bird feeders. The tranquil garden is filled with over 300 species of plants and offers a delightful experience for nature enthusiasts.
name: Jardin de los Picaflores
address: Fray Luis Beltrán 150, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: The Argentine Experience in Puerto Iguazu offers a unique gastronomic experience where visitors can participate in preparing traditional Argentine dishes like empanadas and alfajores. The menu also features succulent meats and renowned Argentine wines. With its fun and interactive presentation, guests are taken on a journey through Argentine cuisine, from the famous empanadas to the delicious alfajor with dulce de leche. This restaurant provides an opportunity to learn about local food while enjoying a memorable dining experience in a friendly atmosphere.
name: The Argentine Experience
address: Av. Brasil 57, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Triple-frontier landmark with an obelisk, Jesuit museum, restaurant, fountain & playground.
detail_description: Marco das Três Fronteiras in Brazil is a significant landmark that marks the meeting point of the borders of Brazil, Argentina, and Paraguay. Situated near the convergence of the Iguacu and Parana rivers, it offers breathtaking panoramic views and a rich cultural experience. Visitors can explore an obelisk, Jesuit museum, restaurant, fountain, and playground on-site.
name: Marco das Três Fronteiras
address: Ac. Três Fronteiras - Foz do Iguaçu, PR, Brazil

detail_description: El Quincho del Tio Querido is a renowned Argentinian restaurant with over 30 years of experience in Puerto Iguazu. Known for its innovative approach and adaptation to diverse needs, it stands out as one of the best Grill Restaurants in Argentina. The restaurant offers a delectable selection of Argentine beef cuts paired with aged wines, providing an exceptional gastronomic experience.
name: El Quincho del Tio Querido
address: Av. Pres. Juan Domingo Perón 159, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: La Casa de Botellas is a remarkable attraction that showcases creativity and innovation. The entire house, including the furniture and decor, is constructed from upcycled plastic bottles and other recycled materials. More than just a visual spectacle, this eco-friendly project aims to inspire visitors to consider their role in preserving nature. Additionally, the initiative serves as a means to uplift people from poverty by teaching them valuable skills for building houses using everyday materials.
name: La Casa de Botellas
address: Av. los Inmigrantes Lote 7 Mz B, 3370 Iguazu, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Casino Iguazú is a trendy entertainment spot situated close to the breathtaking Iguazu Falls in Argentina. This contemporary casino boasts an array of gaming choices, such as slot machines, roulette, blackjack, and baccarat. Additionally, visitors can enjoy electronic games and access a VIP lounge designed for high-stakes players.
name: Casino Iguazú
address: RN12 12, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Modern store offering clothes, makeup, perfume, chocolate, beverages & more from global brands.
detail_description: Duty Free Shop Puerto Iguazu is a spacious and well-organized modern store located in the Argentinian Customs area near Foz do Iguacu. It offers a wide range of products from global brands, including clothing, makeup, perfume, chocolate, beverages, electronics, glasses, watches and more. Visitors can enjoy tax-free shopping with better prices compared to Brazil due to the absence of import taxes in Argentina.
name: Duty Free Shop Puerto Iguazu
address: RN 12, KM 1645, CP 3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Expansive water park with thermal baths, a beach & wave pool, plus water slides & a zip line.
detail_description: Blue Park Foz is a sprawling water park that offers a range of attractions for visitors. The park features thermal baths, a beach with white sand, and a wave pool, as well as water slides and a zip line. Additionally, there are large swimming pools, waterslides, an artificial river for tubing, sports fishing and kayaking lakes, and numerous fast-food options.
name: Blue Park Foz
address: R. Carlos Hugo Urnau, 756 - Lot. Dona Amanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-734, Brazil

detail_description: Dreamland Museu de Cera is a must-visit attraction in Foz do Iguacu, Brazil. This wax museum, part of the Foz do Iguacu Park Show, features numerous lifelike statues of international personalities. Opened in 2014, it offers a unique experience that may make you question your location. The museum is located within Dreams Park and showcases wax figures resembling famous individuals and characters from movies.
name: Dreamland - Museu de Cera
address: Av. das Cataratas - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-832, Brazil

detail_description: Madero Tango Iguazu is not just a restaurant, but one of the most traditional show venues in Argentina, known for its exceptional Tango Show. To provide tourists with a deeper immersion into Argentine culture, they now offer a Dinner Show option featuring a 6-course tasting menu. The performers' presence from the moment the curtain rises is breathtaking, with passionate support from a 5-piece folk band and incredible dancers on stage.
name: Madero Tango Iguazu
address: RN12 2, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Polar-themed ice bar by Dreamland Wax Museum serving drinks in sub-zero temperatures.
detail_description: Nestled within the vibrant Dreamland Complex, Dreams Ice Bar is a one-of-a-kind attraction that transports visitors into a frosty wonderland. This polar-themed ice bar features walls, furniture, and stunning sculptures all crafted from ice, creating an enchanting atmosphere perfect for those seeking respite from the heat of Foz do Iguacu. With temperatures consistently hovering around -11°C (12°F), guests can enjoy exotic drinks served in glasses made of ice while lounging on solid blocks of frozen artistry.
name: Dreams Ice Bar
address: Av. das Cataratas, 8100 - Sala 4 - Foz do Iguaçu, PR, 85853-000, Brazil

detail_description: Parque Natural Municipal Luis Honorio Rolón is a serene and harmonious natural park located near the city center. It boasts a diverse range of native flora, making it an ideal place to spend some leisurely time. Visitors can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of the park while exploring its natural wonders. Additionally, excursions to nearby attractions such as Parque de las Aves are available, providing a comprehensive tour experience that includes transfers and knowledgeable guides for an immersive adventure lasting approximately 4 hours.
name: Parque Natural Municipal Luis Honorio Rolón
address: N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Plazoleta Nuestra Señora de Iguazú is a charming square located in the heart of the city. It is known for its beautiful landscaping, including colorful flowers and lush greenery. The square offers a peaceful atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to relax and take in the surroundings. Visitors can also find various cafes and shops nearby, adding to the vibrant energy of the area.
name: Plazoleta Nuestra Señora de Iguazú
address: N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Hostel Damaris offers a cozy and welcoming atmosphere, making it a great place to connect with fellow travelers. The friendly hosts provide excellent value for money and keep the rooms and facilities clean. While there may be occasional issues like water outages, the overall experience is positive. The hostel's location is convenient, within walking distance of the city center, and they offer helpful services such as arranging taxis for sightseeing trips.
name: Hostel Damaris
address: Peteribi 225, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Polished retreat featuring a buffet restaurant & a spa, plus an outdoor pool & jungle views.
detail_description: Nestled in the lush greenery of Puerto Iguazu, Falls Iguazu Hotel & Spa offers a serene escape for travelers seeking relaxation and adventure. This polished retreat features an inviting buffet restaurant and a rejuvenating spa, perfect for unwinding after exploring the nearby natural wonders. Guests can take advantage of not one but three outdoor pools while soaking in stunning jungle views that invite wildlife sightings. Each spacious room boasts over 30 square meters of comfort, complete with jacuzzi tubs and minibars to enhance your stay.
name: Falls Iguazu Hotel & Spa
address: Batalla Mbororé s/n, Reserva Selva Iryapú, Lote 05,, N3370 Puerto Iguazu, Misiones, Argentina
